title: NERF JG JAX FAST                     PLZ NOT LANE JAX PLZ
body:
So {{champion:24}} is op atm and this is why if you get {{item:3153}} {{item:1304}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3931}}. 
You have 2.5attack speed 
if you get your w and ult proc with a maxed out {{item:3124}} you will hit for 900 ap damage and 500 ad if you also have the fervor of battle.
This is dum as fuck {{champion:10}} is no longer the mix damage god as I tried this on her and it did not work as well as{{champion:24}}  plz riot just nerf jg jax not lane jax as lane {{champion:24}}  is not op 

p.s just think what he would be like if you had {{item:3078}} {{item:3053}} on top of the base build
 he has 130 base ad at lv 18 you do the math that's a extra 260+ ad on that w ult proc so its gona be more like 900 magic damage and 700/800 ad damage 

P.S.S riot this is gameplay so do not take this off the boards

replies.body: Use {{champion:17}}

Dodge his stun.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

(Fucking love these stickers)
me 2 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

He has 1 gap closer.

It's called kiting.

If you have a bad team comp that's your problem.

e don't q for 1.5 sec q instant stun if you time it right trust me I know let me gess just run after the stun no you are dead befer the stun ends the q will do 300+ damage then basic attack and w and there is the combo 2k hp in 1 second how do you deal with that

You're not going to 1 shot a carry with a Gunblade and devourer with botrk.

5 seconds in melee range yes if they are caught out, otherwise no.
well you do and that's not a gunblade try it before you try and say it dose not work
It's not that strong. CC shuts him down so hard just like cc has always shut him down

You still don't 1 shot people dude.

At best, if you are level 16 and they are level 8-12 you can kill people quickly but that's not 1 shotting and after that you only have your movespeed to walk up to people and attack them and it's a long time before you can counter-strike or Q again.

Fed Vayne, Semi-or even non-fed Akali or a Syndra will all kill people insanely quickly so why are you complaining about Jungle Jax? It's a safer bet that Vayne will go and dominate your team, than a melee with one dash CC combo for 1 second will especially with a glass cannon build or build for versing 0 forms of CC or not much burst.
so you have tried this build

Hint: Games should be over before you get that item combo on jungle jax.

In fact the one game you did it in you lost WITH a quadra kill, for the sheer fact that the enemy team was already snowballed (most likely due to jungle presense.)
the game you speak of was a base race but they had more damage on the nexes towers and they were snow balling because of a graves
They were snowballing because of a graves on your team?
no there's hold up what day was the game you speak of

17 hours ago.

First thing i did when you made this post was OP.GG you and facepalm at how you lost.
what the 17/8/12 game wear I was 1 shotting at 18min yep
>In fact the one game you did it in you lost WITH a quadra kill, for the sheer fact that the enemy team was already snowballed (most likely due to jungle presense.)
I still don't know how we went from jax can 1 shot with 3 items to your bad
Basically what i am saying is, the game will be won or loss before your fucking relevant because you will sit in jungle doing sweet fuck all until you have enough items.
ps this works top as well just get this {{item:3146}} and not sated
lol plz you gank to get sated lane to lane and clear as much of jg on the way

Jungle Jax is balanced I think. His ganks aren't very powerful and he needs to AFK farm in the jungle to be useful. This is a really big **disadvantage** our current early game meta. Some games are even ending before 20 minutes.
